name: Line Art - Color by Number
description:
◆The completely new coloring app “Line Art.”
Finally, an app that lets you become truly engrossed in coloring.
There’s no need to search for the right numbers in a giant palette.
You can color with magical ease.

Just connect the numbers displayed on the screen.
Color will appear automatically, and it’ll never go outside the lines.
You can start coloring easily from wherever you like.

◆Powerful stress relief.
Line Art is chock-full of unique drawings to color in.
Sit back, relax, and enjoy some coloring.
Our app lets you lose yourself in your art, so your stress will start to ease before you know it.
Play with this app and enjoy a little escape from your busy life.

◆Main functions
・Plentiful free art
　There are plenty of free drawings for you to play with. Try whichever you like.

・Photography function
　The app has a photography function.
　You can turn your favorite photos or illustrations into line art to color.

・Replay function
　You can save a video of how you colored in a picture.

・You can share to Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, and more.

Enjoy coloring new art, and be careful not to lose track of time!
